alert.note: Alert for Ulster (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 01 at 3:38AM EDT until May 01 at 2:33PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Esopus Creek At Cold Brook. * WHEN...From this morning to this afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, Flood stage. Water begins to overflow banks above Ashokan Reservoir with little damage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:00 PM EDT Sunday the stage was 8.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this morning to a crest of 11.2 feet this morning. It will then fall below flood stage this morning. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 11.2 feet on 03/19/1983. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Esopus Creek Cold Brook Flood Stage: 11.0 Observed Stage at Sun 11 pm: 8.2 Forecast: Mon 8 am 11.2 Mon 2 pm 9.0 Mon 8 pm 7.6 Tue 2 am 7.3 Tue 8 am 7.0 Tue 2 pm 6.9 Tue 8 pm 6.6 Wed 2 am 6.4 Wed 8 am 6.2 Wed 2 pm 6.1 Wed 8 pm 6.1 &&
